<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
</script> -->

}
if(document.ypform.state) {
document.ypform.state.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.RR) {
document.ypform.RR.value = ""
}
}
}
//-->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

<!-- <script>
function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
</script> -->

{
if(document.getElementById("keyword").value != "")
{
document.getElementById("keyword").value=document.getElementById("keyword").value +" "+document.getElementById("location").value;
document.getElementById("location").value="";
}
}
function buildURL(arg_stype) {
cleardefaultText();
var newmaps = "true";
if (
((navigator.appName == "Netscape") || (navigator.appName == "Microsoft Internet Explorer")) &&

var cb= (document.ypform.CB)?escape(document.ypform.CB.value):((document.hiddenform.CB)?escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value):"");

var exchange = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.X)?escape(document.phoneform.X.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.X)?escape(document.ypform.X.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.X)?escape(document.hiddenform.X.value):""));
var phoneline = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.P)?escape(document.phoneform.P.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.P)?escape(document.ypform.P.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.P)?escape(document.hiddenform.P.value):""));
var pagesize= (document.ypform.PS)?escape(document.ypform.PS.options[document.ypform.PS.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.PS)?escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value):"");
var resultradius= (document.ypform.RR && document.ypform.RR.type != "hidden")?escape(document.ypform.RR.options[document.ypform.RR.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.RR)?escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value):"");

document.ypform.PP.checked) {

} else if(document.ypform.PP.type == "hidden") {
presentationPreference = null;
}
}
if(!document.ypform.PP || presentationPreference == null) {
presentationPreference= (document.hiddenform.PP)?escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value):"";
}
var starting_point= "";
if(document.ypform.AL) {
var num=document.ypform.AL.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.AL[i].checked) {
starting_point = document.ypform.AL[i].value;
}
}
} else {
starting_point= (document.hiddenform.AL)?escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value):"";
}
var street="";
var city="";
var zip="";
var state="";
if(starting_point != "" && document.ypform.AL){
street=(document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"";
city=(document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"";
zip=(document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"";
state=(document.hiddenform.S)?escape(document.hiddenform.S.value):"";
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
} else {
street=(document.ypform.E)?escape(document.ypform.E.value):((document.ypform.RE)?escape(document.ypform.RE.value):((document.ypform.streetaddress)?escape(document.ypform.streetaddress.value):((document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"")));

zip=(document.ypform.Z)?escape(document.ypform.Z.value):((document.ypform.RZ)?escape(document.ypform.RZ.value):((document.ypform.zip)?escape(document.ypform.zip.value):((document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"")));

// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.S.options[document.ypform.S.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.S.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.RS) {
if(document.ypform.RS.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.options[document.ypform.RS.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.state) {
state = escape(document.ypform.state.value);
} else if(document.hiddenform.S) {
state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
}
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
}
var sort= "";
if(document.ypform.R && document.ypform.R.type != "hidden") {
var num=document.ypform.R.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.R[i].checked) {
sort = document.ypform.R[i].value;
}
}
} else {
sort= (document.hiddenform.R)?escape(document.hiddenform.R.value):"";
}
} else if(document.hiddenform) {
var form_stype= escape(document.hiddenform.STYPE.value);
var src = escape(document.hiddenform.SRC.value);
var sek = escape(document.hiddenform.SEK.value);
var sekcid = escape(document.hiddenform.SEKCID.value);
var cb = escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value);
var cat = escape(document.hiddenform.C.value);
var name = escape(document.hiddenform.N.value);
var street = escape(document.hiddenform.E.value);
var city = escape(document.hiddenform.T.value);
var zip = escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value);
var areacode = escape(document.hiddenform.A.value);
var exchange = escape(document.hiddenform.X.value);
var phoneline = escape(document.hiddenform.P.value);
var state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
var starting_point= escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value);
var sort= escape(document.hiddenform.R.value);
var pagesize= escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value);
var resultradius= escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value);
var presentationPreference= escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value);
if(document.hiddenform.L) {
var location = escape(document.hiddenform.L.value);
}
}

{
if(var_lastquery_city != "")
location+=var_lastquery_city;

if(location != "")
location+='+';

}

var stype = form_stype;
} else {
var stype = arg_stype;
}

// this condition is only for the mabtab on the advanced search form
var pageName = "yp_error";
if(stype == "M" && (pagesize == null || pagesize == "") && pageName == "yp_detail_form")
var str="SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
else
var str="?SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&PS="+pagesize+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
if ( (document.ypform && document.ypform.L) || (document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.L)) {
str += "&L="+location;
}
if (stype == "D") {
str += "&RE="+street+"&RT="+city+"&RS="+state+"&RZ="+zip;
}else if(stype == "M" && newmaps == "true"){
str += "&L="+location+"&SRC="+src;
}
else {
str += "&E="+street+"&T="+city+"&S="+state+"&Z="+zip;
}
} else {
var str="?SRC=&#38;STYPE=S&#38;PG=L&#38;R=N&#38;C=&#38;N=&#38;T=&#38;S="
}
return str;
}

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});

function buildURL(arg_stype) {
cleardefaultText();

var pagesize= (document.ypform.PS)?escape(document.ypform.PS.options[document.ypform.PS.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.PS)?escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value):"");
var resultradius= (document.ypform.RR && document.ypform.RR.type != "hidden")?escape(document.ypform.RR.options[document.ypform.RR.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.RR)?escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value):"");

if(document.ypform.PP.type != "hidden" &&
document.ypform.PP.checked) {
presentationPreference = document.ypform.PP.value;
} else if(document.ypform.PP.type == "hidden") {
presentationPreference = null;
}
}
if(!document.ypform.PP || presentationPreference == null) {
presentationPreference= (document.hiddenform.PP)?escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value):"";
}
var starting_point= "";
if(document.ypform.AL) {
var num=document.ypform.AL.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.AL[i].checked) {
starting_point = document.ypform.AL[i].value;
}
}
} else {
starting_point= (document.hiddenform.AL)?escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value):"";
}
var street="";
var city="";
var zip="";
var state="";
if(starting_point != "" && document.ypform.AL){
street=(document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"";
city=(document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"";
zip=(document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"";
state=(document.hiddenform.S)?escape(document.hiddenform.S.value):"";
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
} else {
street=(document.ypform.E)?escape(document.ypform.E.value):((document.ypform.RE)?escape(document.ypform.RE.value):((document.ypform.streetaddress)?escape(document.ypform.streetaddress.value):((document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"")));

zip=(document.ypform.Z)?escape(document.ypform.Z.value):((document.ypform.RZ)?escape(document.ypform.RZ.value):((document.ypform.zip)?escape(document.ypform.zip.value):((document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"")));
if(document.ypform.S) {
if(document.ypform.S.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.S.options[document.ypform.S.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.S.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.RS) {
if(document.ypform.RS.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.options[document.ypform.RS.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.state) {
state = escape(document.ypform.state.value);
} else if(document.hiddenform.S) {
state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
}
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
}
var sort= "";
if(document.ypform.R && document.ypform.R.type != "hidden") {
var num=document.ypform.R.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.R[i].checked) {
sort = document.ypform.R[i].value;
}
}
} else {
sort= (document.hiddenform.R)?escape(document.hiddenform.R.value):"";
}
} else if(document.hiddenform) {
var form_stype= escape(document.hiddenform.STYPE.value);
var src = escape(document.hiddenform.SRC.value);
var sek = escape(document.hiddenform.SEK.value);
var sekcid = escape(document.hiddenform.SEKCID.value);
var cb = escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value);
var cat = escape(document.hiddenform.C.value);
var name = escape(document.hiddenform.N.value);
var street = escape(document.hiddenform.E.value);
var city = escape(document.hiddenform.T.value);
var zip = escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value);
var areacode = escape(document.hiddenform.A.value);
var exchange = escape(document.hiddenform.X.value);
var phoneline = escape(document.hiddenform.P.value);
var state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
var starting_point= escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value);
var sort= escape(document.hiddenform.R.value);
var pagesize= escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value);
var resultradius= escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value);
var presentationPreference= escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value);
if(document.hiddenform.L) {
var location = escape(document.hiddenform.L.value);
}
}
if(location != null && location =="")
{
if(var_lastquery_city != "")
location+=var_lastquery_city;
if(var_lastquery_state != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+= var_lastquery_state;
}
if(var_lastquery_zip != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=var_lastquery_zip;
}
}
if(location == "USA" || location =="usa")
location = "";
if (arg_stype == "" && form_stype != "") {
var stype = form_stype;
} else {
var stype = arg_stype;
}
if (sek != "") { var param_sek = "&SEK="+sek+"&SEKCID="+sekcid; } else { var param_sek = ""; }
// this condition is only for the mabtab on the advanced search form
var pageName = "yp_error";
if(stype == "M" && (pagesize == null || pagesize == "") && pageName == "yp_detail_form")
var str="SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
else
var str="?SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&PS="+pagesize+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
if ( (document.ypform && document.ypform.L) || (document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.L)) {
str += "&L="+location;
}
if (stype == "D") {
str += "&RE="+street+"&RT="+city+"&RS="+state+"&RZ="+zip;
}else if(stype == "M" && newmaps == "true"){
str += "&L="+location+"&SRC="+src;
}
else {
str += "&E="+street+"&T="+city+"&S="+state+"&Z="+zip;
}
} else {
var str="?SRC=&#38;STYPE=S&#38;PG=L&#38;R=N&#38;C=&#38;N=&#38;T=&#38;S="
}
return str;
}
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

if(f == null) {
f = document.ypform;

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
</script> -->

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}

}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});

{
if(document.getElementById("keyword").value != "")
{
document.getElementById("keyword").value=document.getElementById("keyword").value +" "+document.getElementById("location").value;
document.getElementById("location").value="";
}

var newmaps = "true";

presentationPreference = null;
}
}
if(!document.ypform.PP || presentationPreference == null) {

}

starting_point = document.ypform.AL[i].value;
}
}

starting_point= (document.hiddenform.AL)?escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value):"";
}

var city="";
var zip="";
var state="";
if(starting_point != "" && document.ypform.AL){
street=(document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"";
city=(document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"";
zip=(document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"";
state=(document.hiddenform.S)?escape(document.hiddenform.S.value):"";
if(location == null || location =="") {

if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';

}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}

street=(document.ypform.E)?escape(document.ypform.E.value):((document.ypform.RE)?escape(document.ypform.RE.value):((document.ypform.streetaddress)?escape(document.ypform.streetaddress.value):((document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"")));

state = escape(document.ypform.S.options[document.ypform.S.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.S.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.RS) {
if(document.ypform.RS.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.options[document.ypform.RS.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.state) {
state = escape(document.ypform.state.value);
} else if(document.hiddenform.S) {
state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
}
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
}
var sort= "";
if(document.ypform.R && document.ypform.R.type != "hidden") {
var num=document.ypform.R.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.R[i].checked) {
sort = document.ypform.R[i].value;
}
}
} else {
sort= (document.hiddenform.R)?escape(document.hiddenform.R.value):"";
}
} else if(document.hiddenform) {
var form_stype= escape(document.hiddenform.STYPE.value);
var src = escape(document.hiddenform.SRC.value);
var sek = escape(document.hiddenform.SEK.value);
var sekcid = escape(document.hiddenform.SEKCID.value);
var cb = escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value);
var cat = escape(document.hiddenform.C.value);
var name = escape(document.hiddenform.N.value);
var street = escape(document.hiddenform.E.value);
var city = escape(document.hiddenform.T.value);
var zip = escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value);
var areacode = escape(document.hiddenform.A.value);
var exchange = escape(document.hiddenform.X.value);
var phoneline = escape(document.hiddenform.P.value);
var state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
var starting_point= escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value);
var sort= escape(document.hiddenform.R.value);
var pagesize= escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value);
var resultradius= escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value);
var presentationPreference= escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value);
if(document.hiddenform.L) {
var location = escape(document.hiddenform.L.value);
}
}

if(location != "")
location+='+';

var stype = form_stype;
} else {
var stype = arg_stype;
}

// this condition is only for the mabtab on the advanced search form

if(stype == "M" && (pagesize == null || pagesize == "") && pageName == "yp_detail_form")
var str="SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
else

if ( (document.ypform && document.ypform.L) || (document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.L)) {
str += "&L="+location;
}
if (stype == "D") {
str += "&RE="+street+"&RT="+city+"&RS="+state+"&RZ="+zip;
}else if(stype == "M" && newmaps == "true"){
str += "&L="+location+"&SRC="+src;
}
else {
str += "&E="+street+"&T="+city+"&S="+state+"&Z="+zip;
}
} else {
var str="?SRC=&#38;STYPE=S&#38;PG=L&#38;R=N&#38;C=&#38;N=&#38;T=&#38;S="
}
return str;
}

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});

if(zip !=""){

}
}

// selection list

} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.value);
}

var state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);

var presentationPreference= escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value);

var location = escape(document.hiddenform.L.value);
}
}
if(location != null && location =="")
{

if(var_lastquery_state != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';

}
}

} else {

}

else
var str="?SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&PS="+pagesize+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
if ( (document.ypform && document.ypform.L) || (document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.L)) {
str += "&L="+location;
}
if (stype == "D") {
str += "&RE="+street+"&RT="+city+"&RS="+state+"&RZ="+zip;
}else if(stype == "M" && newmaps == "true"){
str += "&L="+location+"&SRC="+src;
}
else {
str += "&E="+street+"&T="+city+"&S="+state+"&Z="+zip;
}
} else {
var str="?SRC=&#38;STYPE=S&#38;PG=L&#38;R=N&#38;C=&#38;N=&#38;T=&#38;S="
}
return str;
}
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function verifySimple(f) {
if(f == null) {
f = document.ypform;
}
if(f.C) {
var keywd = f.C.value;
keywd = keywd.replace( /^\s+/g, "" );
keywd = keywd.replace( /\s+$/g, "" );
if(f.N == null && (keywd == "" || keywd == "Required field") || keywd == "Find local businesses e.g. hotels, Dallas TX") {
f.C.value = "Required field";
f.C.style.color = "red";
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
}
if ((f.C && f.N) && (f.C.value == "" && f.N.value == "")) {
alert("Please enter a Keyword or a Business Name.");
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
return true;
}
//-->

<!-- <script>
function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
</script> -->

function updateinputfields()
{
if(document.getElementById("keyword").value != "")
{
document.getElementById("keyword").value=document.getElementById("keyword").value +" "+document.getElementById("location").value;
document.getElementById("location").value="";
}
}
function buildURL(arg_stype) {
cleardefaultText();
var newmaps = "true";
if (
((navigator.appName == "Netscape") || (navigator.appName == "Microsoft Internet Explorer")) &&
(parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3.0) && (document.ypform || document.hiddenform)

var cb= (document.ypform.CB)?escape(document.ypform.CB.value):((document.hiddenform.CB)?escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value):"");

var exchange = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.X)?escape(document.phoneform.X.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.X)?escape(document.ypform.X.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.X)?escape(document.hiddenform.X.value):""));
var phoneline = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.P)?escape(document.phoneform.P.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.P)?escape(document.ypform.P.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.P)?escape(document.hiddenform.P.value):""));
var pagesize= (document.ypform.PS)?escape(document.ypform.PS.options[document.ypform.PS.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.PS)?escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value):"");
var resultradius= (document.ypform.RR && document.ypform.RR.type != "hidden")?escape(document.ypform.RR.options[document.ypform.RR.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.RR)?escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value):"");
var location = (document.ypform.L)?escape(document.ypform.L.value):((document.hiddenform.L)?escape(document.hiddenform.L.value):"");
var presentationPreference= "";
if(document.ypform.PP) {
if(document.ypform.PP.type != "hidden" &&
document.ypform.PP.checked) {
presentationPreference = document.ypform.PP.value;
} else if(document.ypform.PP.type == "hidden") {
presentationPreference = null;
}
}
if(!document.ypform.PP || presentationPreference == null) {
presentationPreference= (document.hiddenform.PP)?escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value):"";
}
var starting_point= "";
if(document.ypform.AL) {
var num=document.ypform.AL.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.AL[i].checked) {
starting_point = document.ypform.AL[i].value;
}
}
} else {
starting_point= (document.hiddenform.AL)?escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value):"";
}
var street="";
var city="";
var zip="";
var state="";
if(starting_point != "" && document.ypform.AL){
street=(document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"";
city=(document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"";
zip=(document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"";
state=(document.hiddenform.S)?escape(document.hiddenform.S.value):"";
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
} else {
street=(document.ypform.E)?escape(document.ypform.E.value):((document.ypform.RE)?escape(document.ypform.RE.value):((document.ypform.streetaddress)?escape(document.ypform.streetaddress.value):((document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"")));

zip=(document.ypform.Z)?escape(document.ypform.Z.value):((document.ypform.RZ)?escape(document.ypform.RZ.value):((document.ypform.zip)?escape(document.ypform.zip.value):((document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"")));
if(document.ypform.S) {
if(document.ypform.S.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.S.options[document.ypform.S.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.S.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.RS) {
if(document.ypform.RS.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.options[document.ypform.RS.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.state) {
state = escape(document.ypform.state.value);
} else if(document.hiddenform.S) {
state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
}
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
}
var sort= "";
if(document.ypform.R && document.ypform.R.type != "hidden") {
var num=document.ypform.R.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.R[i].checked) {
sort = document.ypform.R[i].value;
}
}
} else {
sort= (document.hiddenform.R)?escape(document.hiddenform.R.value):"";
}
} else if(document.hiddenform) {
var form_stype= escape(document.hiddenform.STYPE.value);
var src = escape(document.hiddenform.SRC.value);
var sek = escape(document.hiddenform.SEK.value);
var sekcid = escape(document.hiddenform.SEKCID.value);
var cb = escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value);
var cat = escape(document.hiddenform.C.value);
var name = escape(document.hiddenform.N.value);
var street = escape(document.hiddenform.E.value);
var city = escape(document.hiddenform.T.value);
var zip = escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value);
var areacode = escape(document.hiddenform.A.value);
var exchange = escape(document.hiddenform.X.value);
var phoneline = escape(document.hiddenform.P.value);
var state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
var starting_point= escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value);
var sort= escape(document.hiddenform.R.value);
var pagesize= escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value);
var resultradius= escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value);
var presentationPreference= escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value);
if(document.hiddenform.L) {
var location = escape(document.hiddenform.L.value);
}
}
if(location != null && location =="")
{
if(var_lastquery_city != "")
location+=var_lastquery_city;
if(var_lastquery_state != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+= var_lastquery_state;
}
if(var_lastquery_zip != "")

if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=var_lastquery_zip;
}
}
if(location == "USA" || location =="usa")
location = "";
if (arg_stype == "" && form_stype != "") {
var stype = form_stype;
} else {
var stype = arg_stype;
}
if (sek != "") { var param_sek = "&SEK="+sek+"&SEKCID="+sekcid; } else { var param_sek = ""; }
// this condition is only for the mabtab on the advanced search form
var pageName = "yp_error";
if(stype == "M" && (pagesize == null || pagesize == "") && pageName == "yp_detail_form")
var str="SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
else
var str="?SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&PS="+pagesize+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
if ( (document.ypform && document.ypform.L) || (document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.L)) {
str += "&L="+location;
}
if (stype == "D") {
str += "&RE="+street+"&RT="+city+"&RS="+state+"&RZ="+zip;
}else if(stype == "M" && newmaps == "true"){
str += "&L="+location+"&SRC="+src;
}
else {
str += "&E="+street+"&T="+city+"&S="+state+"&Z="+zip;
}
} else {
var str="?SRC=&#38;STYPE=S&#38;PG=L&#38;R=N&#38;C=&#38;N=&#38;T=&#38;S="
}
return str;
}

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});

var phoneline = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.P)?escape(document.phoneform.P.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.P)?escape(document.ypform.P.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.P)?escape(document.hiddenform.P.value):""));
var pagesize= (document.ypform.PS)?escape(document.ypform.PS.options[document.ypform.PS.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.PS)?escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value):"");
var resultradius= (document.ypform.RR && document.ypform.RR.type != "hidden")?escape(document.ypform.RR.options[document.ypform.RR.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.RR)?escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value):"");
var location = (document.ypform.L)?escape(document.ypform.L.value):((document.hiddenform.L)?escape(document.hiddenform.L.value):"");
var presentationPreference= "";
if(document.ypform.PP) {
if(document.ypform.PP.type != "hidden" &&
document.ypform.PP.checked) {
presentationPreference = document.ypform.PP.value;
} else if(document.ypform.PP.type == "hidden") {
presentationPreference = null;
}
}
if(!document.ypform.PP || presentationPreference == null) {
presentationPreference= (document.hiddenform.PP)?escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value):"";
}
var starting_point= "";
if(document.ypform.AL) {
var num=document.ypform.AL.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.AL[i].checked) {
starting_point = document.ypform.AL[i].value;
}
}
} else {
starting_point= (document.hiddenform.AL)?escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value):"";
}
var street="";
var city="";
var zip="";
var state="";
if(starting_point != "" && document.ypform.AL){
street=(document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"";
city=(document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"";
zip=(document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"";
state=(document.hiddenform.S)?escape(document.hiddenform.S.value):"";
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
} else {
street=(document.ypform.E)?escape(document.ypform.E.value):((document.ypform.RE)?escape(document.ypform.RE.value):((document.ypform.streetaddress)?escape(document.ypform.streetaddress.value):((document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"")));
city=(document.ypform.T)?escape(document.ypform.T.value):((document.ypform.RT)?escape(document.ypform.RT.value):((document.ypform.city)?escape(document.ypform.city.value):((document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"")));
zip=(document.ypform.Z)?escape(document.ypform.Z.value):((document.ypform.RZ)?escape(document.ypform.RZ.value):((document.ypform.zip)?escape(document.ypform.zip.value):((document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"")));
if(document.ypform.S) {
if(document.ypform.S.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.S.options[document.ypform.S.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.S.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.RS) {
if(document.ypform.RS.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.options[document.ypform.RS.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.state) {
state = escape(document.ypform.state.value);
} else if(document.hiddenform.S) {
state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
}
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
}
var sort= "";
if(document.ypform.R && document.ypform.R.type != "hidden") {
var num=document.ypform.R.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.R[i].checked) {
sort = document.ypform.R[i].value;
}
}
} else {
sort= (document.hiddenform.R)?escape(document.hiddenform.R.value):"";
}
} else if(document.hiddenform) {
var form_stype= escape(document.hiddenform.STYPE.value);
var src = escape(document.hiddenform.SRC.value);
var sek = escape(document.hiddenform.SEK.value);
var sekcid = escape(document.hiddenform.SEKCID.value);
var cb = escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value);
var cat = escape(document.hiddenform.C.value);
var name = escape(document.hiddenform.N.value);
var street = escape(document.hiddenform.E.value);
var city = escape(document.hiddenform.T.value);
var zip = escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value);
var areacode = escape(document.hiddenform.A.value);
var exchange = escape(document.hiddenform.X.value);
var phoneline = escape(document.hiddenform.P.value);
var state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
var starting_point= escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value);
var sort= escape(document.hiddenform.R.value);
var pagesize= escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value);
var resultradius= escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value);
var presentationPreference= escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value);
if(document.hiddenform.L) {
var location = escape(document.hiddenform.L.value);
}
}
if(location != null && location =="")
{
if(var_lastquery_city != "")
location+=var_lastquery_city;
if(var_lastquery_state != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+= var_lastquery_state;
}
if(var_lastquery_zip != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=var_lastquery_zip;
}
}
if(location == "USA" || location =="usa")
location = "";
if (arg_stype == "" && form_stype != "") {
var stype = form_stype;
} else {
var stype = arg_stype;
}
if (sek != "") { var param_sek = "&SEK="+sek+"&SEKCID="+sekcid; } else { var param_sek = ""; }
// this condition is only for the mabtab on the advanced search form
var pageName = "yp_error";
if(stype == "M" && (pagesize == null || pagesize == "") && pageName == "yp_detail_form")
var str="SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
else
var str="?SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&PS="+pagesize+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
if ( (document.ypform && document.ypform.L) || (document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.L)) {
str += "&L="+location;
}
if (stype == "D") {
str += "&RE="+street+"&RT="+city+"&RS="+state+"&RZ="+zip;
}else if(stype == "M" && newmaps == "true"){
str += "&L="+location+"&SRC="+src;
}
else {
str += "&E="+street+"&T="+city+"&S="+state+"&Z="+zip;
}
} else {
var str="?SRC=&#38;STYPE=S&#38;PG=L&#38;R=N&#38;C=&#38;N=&#38;T=&#38;S="
}
return str;
}
// -->
</script>

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript"><!--

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
</script> -->

}
if(document.ypform.state) {
document.ypform.state.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.RR) {
document.ypform.RR.value = ""
}
}
}
//-->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

if(id != 0){
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1){
var morefeat = $("#mofe" + id).clone();
features = $(features).append($("#fl" + id).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon" + id) || $(this).is("#of" + id))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){ $("#dmf" + id).remove(); }
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
}else{
/* when pinTag value is not available for a listing,
at that mofe and f1 div is not renedering with proper id in listingpage.links.jsf.
For that reason it's require to retrieve mofe and f1 div as a children of mpbtm div.
*/
var morefeat = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#mofe");
var fl = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#fl");
features = $(features).append($(fl).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon") || $(this).is("#of"))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){
$("#dmf" + (listingNumber+1)).remove();
}
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
if(yextag){
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("margin","4px 0 0 0");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("float","left");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("display","block");
$(".yextall",yextag).css("display","none");
$(".yexttrim",yextag).css("display","block");
$(yextag.html()).prependTo($(features));
}
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1 || yextag){
return features.html();
} else {
return;
}
}
function gbplc(id) {
//console.log("enter gbplc id: " + id);
var fltp = 2;
var clone = $(".pin" + id).clone();
if (clone) {
var text = $('.detailName',clone).text();
var charsLength = text.length;
var adds = $(".address",clone).html();
var moreInfo = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('onclick');
var mInfohref = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('href');
$(".listResults",clone).after("<div class='addressDetails'>"+adds+"</div>");
$(".vlst",clone).after("<p style='float:left;padding-top:15px;clear:both'><a onclick='"+moreInfo+"'" + " href='"+mInfohref+"'>More Info</a></p>");
//console.info(adds);
$(".address",clone).remove();
$(".yext-tag",clone).remove();
$("#reviewimagediv",clone).remove();
$(".reviewtext1",clone).remove();
$(".links",clone).remove();
$(".icons",clone).remove();
$(".business-text",clone).remove();
$(".phone",clone).remove();
$(".listingNumber",clone).remove();
var bush = $('.detailName',clone).width();
var addh = $('.address',clone).outerHeight();
var rewh = (bush + addh) + 2;
$(".addressDetails",clone).css("top", bush + "px");
$("#flyoutDiv .reviews",clone).css("top", rewh + "px");
}
var clnHtml = clone.html();
//console.log("clnHtml: " + clnHtml);
var trackingAttrWithMap = 'data-track=\'{\"inmap\":\"true\",';
if ($.browser.msie) {
var trackingAttr = new RegExp('data-track=\'{', 'g');
clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(trackingAttr, trackingAttrWithMap);
}
else {
var addMapIndEnd = '}\'';
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/data-track=\"{/g,trackingAttrWithMap);
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/}\"/g,addMapIndEnd);
}
return fltp + "spFlyoutType" + "<section class=\"listings\" style=\"width:auto;padding-bottom:0px;margin-bottom:0px;\"><article style=\"padding:0px;border-bottom:none;\">"+clnHtml + "</article></section>";
}
function hlListing(n) {
var a = document.getElementsByTagName("article");
for (var i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
var e = $(".atlist" + i);
if (e) {
if (n == i){
e.css("background-color","#DBEBF2");
} else {
e.css("background-color","");
}
}
}
}
$(document).ready( function() {
$(".pager a").click( function(e) {
s.prop41="Listing Results:Sort by:Pagination";
});
$(".listResults > a").rightClick( function(e) {
var nwurl = $("#rcurl" + $(this).attr('id')).attr("title");
if(nwurl!=null && nwurl!="null"){
$(this).attr("href", nwurl);
}
});
});
function loadMap(){
GetMap();
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function logBPClick(bidClickUrl, clickBase)
{
if(bidClickUrl == 0) {
tsrc = clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
} else {
tsrc = clickBase + bidClickUrl;
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
}
}
function timebplogClick(t) {
var img = new Image();
img.src = t;
}
</script>

function resizeSearch() {

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function distLink () {
var rr=document.distance.RR.value;
var ppvalue = '';
if (rr == '0'){
ppvalue = "&PP=L";
}
var rrvalue = '';
if (rr != 'AA'){ rrvalue = '&local=on&RR='+rr; }
var urlaa='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=grooming+near+80903&CTS=Pet+Grooming&R=D&MCBP=true&F=1';
// Generate a distance sort link:
var url='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=grooming+near+80903&CTS=Pet+Grooming&R=D&EG=1&MCBP=true&OO=1&F=1'+rrvalue+ppvalue;
if (rr == 'AA'){ document.location.href=urlaa; } else{ document.location.href=url;}
}
</script>

$( ".more").click(function () {

$( "#categorymodal" ).slideDown( "fast" );
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
$("#changecity").hide();
} else {
$( "#categorymodal" ).hide();
}

$("#categorymodal").hide();

$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
}

function logClick(bidClickUrl, listingClickInfo, clickType,clkTracker,adOrCampaign)
{
var img = new Image();
var d = new Date();
var adLog = adOrCampaign == 'AD' ? "http://mpclicks.superpages.com/ct?SRC=&TGT=SP&PN=2&T=Colorado+Springs&S=CO&C=grooming&PGID=yp605.8083.1445202425568.171682497224&TRS=nbt&ACT=log,red": "http://clicks.superpages.com/ct/clickThrough?SRC=&target=SP&PN=2&FP=listings&T=Colorado+Springs&S=CO&Z=80903&C=grooming&PGID=yp605.8083.1445202425568.171682497224&ALG=113&TS=nbt&OF=1&ACTION=log,red";

tsrc = s_clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
//alert("In the 1 pixel image tracking condition");
} else {
//alert("In the bidClick tracking function");
tsrc = s_clickBase + bidClickUrl;
}
setTimeout("timelogClick(tsrc)",10);
}

var clickLoc = u + "&" + lt;
img.src = clickLoc;
}

<div id="alertLayer" class="alertBoxStyle"></div>
<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
yexturl = "http://pl.yext.com/pljs?pid=2cd0f1d10f&event=serp_impression";
yextids = "1487643,2017212";
get_yextag();
yext_click(yextids,'impression')
function get_yextag(){
$.getJSON(yexturl + '&ids=' + yextids + '&callback=?',
function(jd) {
$.each(jd, function(i,item){
yext_tag(this,item);
});
});
}
function yext_tag(i,datos) {
//var div = $("#yext_" + datos.yextId);
//var divc = $("#yextc_" + datos.yextId);
/*
* to support rendering of multiple elemetnt with same id above code got blocked
* and below code change got introduced. IR01809074
*/
var div = $("span[id=yext_" + datos.yextId+"]");
var divc = $("span[id=yextc_" + datos.yextId+"]");
for (var j = 0; j <div.length; j++){
var ytag = "";
var soUrl = datos.specialOffer.url;
var clickBP = $(div[j]).attr('onClick');
$(div[j]).removeAttr('title');
if(datos.specialOffer.message != "") {
datatag = "";
dt = datos.specialOffer.message;
dl = dt.length;
did = datos.yextId;
dtle = dt;
dtle = dtle.replace(/'/g, "&#039;");
if(dl > 19){ datatag = dt.substring(0,16) + "..."; }else{ datatag = dt; }
//ytag = "<div class='yext-tag' style='float:left;min-width:100px;margin-top:5px;white-space: pre-line;'> ";
ytag = "<p class='yext-tag' id='yext-tag"+ j + "' > ";
if(soUrl) {
var dtrack = '{"title":"Yext Special Offer"}';
ytag = ytag + "<a href='" + soUrl + "' id='yext-link"+ j + "' data-track='" + dtrack + "' onClick='yext_click(\"" + did + "\",\"click\");' target='_blank' title='"+ dtle +"'>";
}
ytagc = ytag + unescape(dt);
ytag = ytag + unescape(datatag);
if(soUrl != ""){ //ytag = ytag + "</a></div>";
ytag = ytag + "</a></p>";
$(div[j]).html(ytagc);
$(divc[j]).html(ytag);
} else {
$(divc[j]).css("display","none");
}
}
}
}
function yext_click(id,act){
// NOTE: clicks are routed through Yext for click tracking
var target = "";
var pagesrc="serp";
if(act == "click"){
target = "&target=specialoffer";
}
var selectedcategory = "grooming";

<script language=JavaScript type=text/javascript>
<!--
var itemIDNumber=0;
var itemFL="FL=top";
// multiple links on the page may the same overlay div.
// these functions display/hide the overlay in a position relative to the links
// (the links are moreN and lessN, where N is itemNumber)
// and hide or show those links as appropriate
// we also sets up logging, so we can distinguish clicks on different links (by fl param)
function showListingsOverlay(itemNumber, fl)
{
// since we have a link to display this in multiple places, a user may scroll around
// and click from multiple places. so if overlay was already displayed - hide it and reset the link to display it
hideListingsOverlay();
// these two vars are defined above and are set here for use in closing!
itemIDNumber=itemNumber;
itemFL=fl;
var ref = document.getElementById('less'+itemIDNumber);
var div = document.getElementById('listingsOverlay');
// if we are at the top, display overlay just below the link
if (itemFL=='FL=top')
moveElement(div, ref, 20);
else {
// this is the link at the bottom, get the height and place the overlay just above the link
var myHeight = 40;
if (div.currentStyle) { //ie way
myHeight = div.offsetHeight;
}
if (window.getComputedStyle) { //mozilla way
var myElementCS = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(div, null);
myHeight = parseInt(myElementCS.getPropertyValue('height'));
}
moveElement(div, ref, -(myHeight));
}
overlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('less'+itemIDNumber);
showform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
}
function hideListingsOverlay()
{
hideoverlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
showform('less'+itemIDNumber);
}
function moveElement(el, ref, topOff)
{
var referTop = ref.offsetTop;
var tempRef = ref;
while(tempRef.offsetParent){
tempRef = tempRef.offsetParent;
referTop += tempRef.offsetTop;
}
el.style.top = referTop + topOff;
}
// change the logging params to reflect which link was clicked
function setFL(href)
{
return href.replace("FL=top", itemFL);
}
// -->
</script>
<a href="#" class="back-to-top"></a>
<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function BrowserCheck() {
var b = navigator.appName;
if (b == "Netscape") this.b = "NS";
else if (b == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") this.b = "IE";
else this.b = b;
this.v = parseInt(navigator.appVersion);
this.NS = (this.b == "NS" && this.v>=4);
this.NS4 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 4);
this.NS5 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 5);
this.IE = (this.b == "IE" && this.v>=4);
this.IE4 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 4')>0);
this.IE5 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 5')>0);
if (this.IE5 || this.NS5) this.VER5 = true;
if (this.IE4 || this.NS4) this.VER4 = true;
this.OLD = (! this.VER5 && ! this.VER4) ? true : false;
this.min = (this.NS||this.IE);
}
is = new BrowserCheck();
alertBox = (is.VER5) ? document.getElementById("alertLayer").style
: (is.NS) ? document.layers["alertLayer"]
: document.all["alertLayer"].style;
$(document).ready(function() {
if (typeof mapable !== 'undefined' && mapable==true){
$("#myMap").css("position", "relative");
$("#myMap").css('border-bottom', '6px solid #677580');
}else{
$("#myMap").css("position", "absolute");
$("#myMap").css('border', 0 +'px');
}
var offset = 220;
var duration = 10;
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
} else {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
}
});
jQuery('.back-to-top').click(function(event) {
event.preventDefault();
jQuery('html, body').animate({scrollTop: 0}, duration);
return false;
})
});
function concatState(str) {
var res = str.substring(0, str.indexOf(',')).replace('<h2','<div').replace('</h2>','</div>');
  return res;
}
var city = $("#cityState").html();
var search = $("#catid").html()
document.getElementById("cityonly").innerHTML = concatState(city)+ " ";
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function verifySimple(f) {
if(f == null) {
f = document.ypform;
}
if(f.C) {
var keywd = f.C.value;
keywd = keywd.replace( /^\s+/g, "" );
keywd = keywd.replace( /\s+$/g, "" );
if(f.N == null && (keywd == "" || keywd == "Required field") || keywd == "Find local businesses e.g. hotels, Dallas TX") {
f.C.value = "Required field";
f.C.style.color = "red";
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
}
if ((f.C && f.N) && (f.C.value == "" && f.N.value == "")) {
alert("Please enter a Keyword or a Business Name.");
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
return true;
}

<!-- <script>
function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
</script> -->

document.getElementById("keyword").value=document.getElementById("keyword").value +" "+document.getElementById("location").value;
document.getElementById("location").value="";
}

/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}

resizeSearch();
});

function buildURL(arg_stype) {
cleardefaultText();
var newmaps = "true";
if (
((navigator.appName == "Netscape") || (navigator.appName == "Microsoft Internet Explorer")) &&
(parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3.0) && (document.ypform || document.hiddenform)

var form_stype= (document.ypform.STYPE)?escape(document.ypform.STYPE.value):((document.hiddenform.STYPE)?escape(document.hiddenform.STYPE.value):"");
var src= (document.ypform.SRC)?escape(document.ypform.SRC.value):((document.hiddenform.SRC)?escape(document.hiddenform.SRC.value):"");
var cb= (document.ypform.CB)?escape(document.ypform.CB.value):((document.hiddenform.CB)?escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value):"");
var cat= (document.ypform.C)?escape(document.ypform.C.value):((document.hiddenform.C)?escape(document.hiddenform.C.value):"");
var name= (document.ypform.N)?escape(document.ypform.N.value):((document.hiddenform.N)?escape(document.hiddenform.N.value):"");
var sek= (document.ypform.SEK)?escape(document.ypform.SEK.value):((document.hiddenform.SEK)?escape(document.hiddenform.SEK.value):"");
var sekcid= (document.ypform.SEKCID)?escape(document.ypform.SEKCID.value):((document.hiddenform.SEKCID)?escape(document.hiddenform.SEKCID.value):"");
var areacode = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.A)?escape(document.phoneform.A.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.A)?escape(document.ypform.A.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.A)?escape(document.hiddenform.A.value):""));
var exchange = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.X)?escape(document.phoneform.X.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.X)?escape(document.ypform.X.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.X)?escape(document.hiddenform.X.value):""));
var phoneline = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.P)?escape(document.phoneform.P.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.P)?escape(document.ypform.P.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.P)?escape(document.hiddenform.P.value):""));
var pagesize= (document.ypform.PS)?escape(document.ypform.PS.options[document.ypform.PS.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.PS)?escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value):"");
var resultradius= (document.ypform.RR && document.ypform.RR.type != "hidden")?escape(document.ypform.RR.options[document.ypform.RR.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.RR)?escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value):"");
var location = (document.ypform.L)?escape(document.ypform.L.value):((document.hiddenform.L)?escape(document.hiddenform.L.value):"");
var presentationPreference= "";
if(document.ypform.PP) {
if(document.ypform.PP.type != "hidden" &&
document.ypform.PP.checked) {
presentationPreference = document.ypform.PP.value;
} else if(document.ypform.PP.type == "hidden") {
presentationPreference = null;
}
}
if(!document.ypform.PP || presentationPreference == null) {
presentationPreference= (document.hiddenform.PP)?escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value):"";
}
var starting_point= "";
if(document.ypform.AL) {
var num=document.ypform.AL.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.AL[i].checked) {
starting_point = document.ypform.AL[i].value;
}
}
} else {
starting_point= (document.hiddenform.AL)?escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value):"";
}
var street="";
var city="";
var zip="";
var state="";
if(starting_point != "" && document.ypform.AL){
street=(document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"";
city=(document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"";
zip=(document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"";
state=(document.hiddenform.S)?escape(document.hiddenform.S.value):"";
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
} else {
street=(document.ypform.E)?escape(document.ypform.E.value):((document.ypform.RE)?escape(document.ypform.RE.value):((document.ypform.streetaddress)?escape(document.ypform.streetaddress.value):((document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"")));
city=(document.ypform.T)?escape(document.ypform.T.value):((document.ypform.RT)?escape(document.ypform.RT.value):((document.ypform.city)?escape(document.ypform.city.value):((document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"")));
zip=(document.ypform.Z)?escape(document.ypform.Z.value):((document.ypform.RZ)?escape(document.ypform.RZ.value):((document.ypform.zip)?escape(document.ypform.zip.value):((document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"")));
if(document.ypform.S) {
if(document.ypform.S.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.S.options[document.ypform.S.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.S.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.RS) {
if(document.ypform.RS.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.options[document.ypform.RS.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.state) {
state = escape(document.ypform.state.value);
} else if(document.hiddenform.S) {
state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
}
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
}
var sort= "";
if(document.ypform.R && document.ypform.R.type != "hidden") {
var num=document.ypform.R.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.R[i].checked) {
sort = document.ypform.R[i].value;
}
}
} else {
sort= (document.hiddenform.R)?escape(document.hiddenform.R.value):"";
}
} else if(document.hiddenform) {
var form_stype= escape(document.hiddenform.STYPE.value);
var src = escape(document.hiddenform.SRC.value);
var sek = escape(document.hiddenform.SEK.value);
var sekcid = escape(document.hiddenform.SEKCID.value);
var cb = escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value);
var cat = escape(document.hiddenform.C.value);
var name = escape(document.hiddenform.N.value);
var street = escape(document.hiddenform.E.value);
var city = escape(document.hiddenform.T.value);
var zip = escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value);
var areacode = escape(document.hiddenform.A.value);
var exchange = escape(document.hiddenform.X.value);
var phoneline = escape(document.hiddenform.P.value);
var state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
var starting_point= escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value);
var sort= escape(document.hiddenform.R.value);
var pagesize= escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value);
var resultradius= escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value);
var presentationPreference= escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value);
if(document.hiddenform.L) {
var location = escape(document.hiddenform.L.value);
}
}
if(location != null && location =="")
{
if(var_lastquery_city != "")
location+=var_lastquery_city;
if(var_lastquery_state != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+= var_lastquery_state;
}
if(var_lastquery_zip != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=var_lastquery_zip;
}
}
if(location == "USA" || location =="usa")
location = "";
if (arg_stype == "" && form_stype != "") {
var stype = form_stype;
} else {
var stype = arg_stype;
}
if (sek != "") { var param_sek = "&SEK="+sek+"&SEKCID="+sekcid; } else { var param_sek = ""; }
// this condition is only for the mabtab on the advanced search form
var pageName = "yp_error";
if(stype == "M" && (pagesize == null || pagesize == "") && pageName == "yp_detail_form")
var str="SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
else
var str="?SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&PS="+pagesize+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
if ( (document.ypform && document.ypform.L) || (document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.L)) {
str += "&L="+location;
}
if (stype == "D") {
str += "&RE="+street+"&RT="+city+"&RS="+state+"&RZ="+zip;
}else if(stype == "M" && newmaps == "true"){
str += "&L="+location+"&SRC="+src;
}
else {
str += "&E="+street+"&T="+city+"&S="+state+"&Z="+zip;
}
} else {
var str="?SRC=&#38;STYPE=S&#38;PG=L&#38;R=N&#38;C=&#38;N=&#38;T=&#38;S="
}
return str;
}
// -->
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
</script> -->

}
} else if(document.ypform.RS) {

// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.options[document.ypform.RS.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.state) {
state = escape(document.ypform.state.value);
} else if(document.hiddenform.S) {
state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
}
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")

for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.R[i].checked) {
sort = document.ypform.R[i].value;
}
}
} else {
sort= (document.hiddenform.R)?escape(document.hiddenform.R.value):"";
}

var zip = escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value);

}

str += "&L="+location;
}

str += "&RE="+street+"&RT="+city+"&RS="+state+"&RZ="+zip;

str += "&L="+location+"&SRC="+src;
}

}
} else {
var str="?SRC=&#38;STYPE=S&#38;PG=L&#38;R=N&#38;C=&#38;N=&#38;T=&#38;S="
}
return str;

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
<!--
function clearit()
{
if (((navigator.appName == "Netscape") && (parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3.0)) || ((navigator.appName == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") &&
(parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2.0)))
{
if(document.ypform.C && document.ypform.C.type != "hidden") {
document.ypform.C.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.N) {
document.ypform.N.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.T) {
document.ypform.T.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.E) {
document.ypform.E.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.S) {
document.ypform.S.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.Z) {
document.ypform.Z.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.A) {
document.ypform.A.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.X) {
document.ypform.X.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.P) {
document.ypform.P.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.AXP) {
document.ypform.AXP.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.RT) {
document.ypform.RT.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.RS) {
document.ypform.RS.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.RZ) {
document.ypform.RZ.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.RE) {
document.ypform.RE.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.zip) {
document.ypform.zip.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.L) {
document.ypform.L.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.location) {
document.ypform.location.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.streetaddress) {
document.ypform.streetaddress.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.city) {
document.ypform.city.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.state) {
document.ypform.state.value = ""
}
if(document.ypform.RR) {
document.ypform.RR.value = ""
}
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

<!-- <script>
function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
</script> -->

function updateinputfields()
{
if(document.getElementById("keyword").value != "")
{
document.getElementById("keyword").value=document.getElementById("keyword").value +" "+document.getElementById("location").value;
document.getElementById("location").value="";
}
}
function buildURL(arg_stype) {
cleardefaultText();
var newmaps = "true";
if (
((navigator.appName == "Netscape") || (navigator.appName == "Microsoft Internet Explorer")) &&
(parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3.0) && (document.ypform || document.hiddenform)
) {
if(document.ypform) {
var form_stype= (document.ypform.STYPE)?escape(document.ypform.STYPE.value):((document.hiddenform.STYPE)?escape(document.hiddenform.STYPE.value):"");
var src= (document.ypform.SRC)?escape(document.ypform.SRC.value):((document.hiddenform.SRC)?escape(document.hiddenform.SRC.value):"");
var cb= (document.ypform.CB)?escape(document.ypform.CB.value):((document.hiddenform.CB)?escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value):"");
var cat= (document.ypform.C)?escape(document.ypform.C.value):((document.hiddenform.C)?escape(document.hiddenform.C.value):"");

var sekcid= (document.ypform.SEKCID)?escape(document.ypform.SEKCID.value):((document.hiddenform.SEKCID)?escape(document.hiddenform.SEKCID.value):"");
var areacode = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.A)?escape(document.phoneform.A.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.A)?escape(document.ypform.A.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.A)?escape(document.hiddenform.A.value):""));
var exchange = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.X)?escape(document.phoneform.X.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.X)?escape(document.ypform.X.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.X)?escape(document.hiddenform.X.value):""));
var phoneline = (document.phoneform && document.phoneform.P)?escape(document.phoneform.P.value):((document.ypform && document.ypform.P)?escape(document.ypform.P.value):((document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.P)?escape(document.hiddenform.P.value):""));
var pagesize= (document.ypform.PS)?escape(document.ypform.PS.options[document.ypform.PS.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.PS)?escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value):"");
var resultradius= (document.ypform.RR && document.ypform.RR.type != "hidden")?escape(document.ypform.RR.options[document.ypform.RR.selectedIndex].value):((document.hiddenform.RR)?escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value):"");
var location = (document.ypform.L)?escape(document.ypform.L.value):((document.hiddenform.L)?escape(document.hiddenform.L.value):"");
var presentationPreference= "";
if(document.ypform.PP) {
if(document.ypform.PP.type != "hidden" &&
document.ypform.PP.checked) {
presentationPreference = document.ypform.PP.value;
} else if(document.ypform.PP.type == "hidden") {
presentationPreference = null;
}
}
if(!document.ypform.PP || presentationPreference == null) {
presentationPreference= (document.hiddenform.PP)?escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value):"";
}
var starting_point= "";
if(document.ypform.AL) {
var num=document.ypform.AL.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.AL[i].checked) {
starting_point = document.ypform.AL[i].value;
}
}
} else {
starting_point= (document.hiddenform.AL)?escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value):"";
}
var street="";
var city="";
var zip="";
var state="";
if(starting_point != "" && document.ypform.AL){
street=(document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"";
city=(document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"";
zip=(document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"";
state=(document.hiddenform.S)?escape(document.hiddenform.S.value):"";
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
} else {
street=(document.ypform.E)?escape(document.ypform.E.value):((document.ypform.RE)?escape(document.ypform.RE.value):((document.ypform.streetaddress)?escape(document.ypform.streetaddress.value):((document.hiddenform.E)?escape(document.hiddenform.E.value):"")));
city=(document.ypform.T)?escape(document.ypform.T.value):((document.ypform.RT)?escape(document.ypform.RT.value):((document.ypform.city)?escape(document.ypform.city.value):((document.hiddenform.T)?escape(document.hiddenform.T.value):"")));
zip=(document.ypform.Z)?escape(document.ypform.Z.value):((document.ypform.RZ)?escape(document.ypform.RZ.value):((document.ypform.zip)?escape(document.ypform.zip.value):((document.hiddenform.Z)?escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value):"")));
if(document.ypform.S) {
if(document.ypform.S.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.S.options[document.ypform.S.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.S.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.RS) {
if(document.ypform.RS.options) {
// selection list
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.options[document.ypform.RS.selectedIndex].value);
} else {
state = escape(document.ypform.RS.value);
}
} else if(document.ypform.state) {
state = escape(document.ypform.state.value);
} else if(document.hiddenform.S) {
state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
}
if(location == null || location =="") {
location = city;
if(state !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=state;
}
if(zip !=""){
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=zip;
}
}
}
var sort= "";
if(document.ypform.R && document.ypform.R.type != "hidden") {
var num=document.ypform.R.length;
for(var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
if(document.ypform.R[i].checked) {
sort = document.ypform.R[i].value;
}
}
} else {
sort= (document.hiddenform.R)?escape(document.hiddenform.R.value):"";
}
} else if(document.hiddenform) {
var form_stype= escape(document.hiddenform.STYPE.value);
var src = escape(document.hiddenform.SRC.value);
var sek = escape(document.hiddenform.SEK.value);
var sekcid = escape(document.hiddenform.SEKCID.value);
var cb = escape(document.hiddenform.CB.value);
var cat = escape(document.hiddenform.C.value);
var name = escape(document.hiddenform.N.value);
var street = escape(document.hiddenform.E.value);
var city = escape(document.hiddenform.T.value);
var zip = escape(document.hiddenform.Z.value);
var areacode = escape(document.hiddenform.A.value);
var exchange = escape(document.hiddenform.X.value);
var phoneline = escape(document.hiddenform.P.value);
var state = escape(document.hiddenform.S.value);
var starting_point= escape(document.hiddenform.AL.value);
var sort= escape(document.hiddenform.R.value);
var pagesize= escape(document.hiddenform.PS.value);
var resultradius= escape(document.hiddenform.RR.value);
var presentationPreference= escape(document.hiddenform.PP.value);
if(document.hiddenform.L) {
var location = escape(document.hiddenform.L.value);
}
}
if(location != null && location =="")
{
if(var_lastquery_city != "")
location+=var_lastquery_city;
if(var_lastquery_state != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+= var_lastquery_state;
}
if(var_lastquery_zip != "")
{
if(location != "")
location+='+';
location+=var_lastquery_zip;
}
}
if(location == "USA" || location =="usa")
location = "";
if (arg_stype == "" && form_stype != "") {
var stype = form_stype;
} else {
var stype = arg_stype;
}
if (sek != "") { var param_sek = "&SEK="+sek+"&SEKCID="+sekcid; } else { var param_sek = ""; }
// this condition is only for the mabtab on the advanced search form
var pageName = "yp_error";
if(stype == "M" && (pagesize == null || pagesize == "") && pageName == "yp_detail_form")
var str="SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
else
var str="?SRC="+src+param_sek+"&STYPE="+stype+"&CB="+cb+"&C="+cat+"&N="+name+"&A="+areacode+"&X="+exchange+"&P="+phoneline+"&AL="+starting_point+"&R="+sort+"&PS="+pagesize+"&RR="+resultradius+"&PP="+presentationPreference;
if ( (document.ypform && document.ypform.L) || (document.hiddenform && document.hiddenform.L)) {
str += "&L="+location;
}
if (stype == "D") {
str += "&RE="+street+"&RT="+city+"&RS="+state+"&RZ="+zip;
}else if(stype == "M" && newmaps == "true"){
str += "&L="+location+"&SRC="+src;
}
else {
str += "&E="+street+"&T="+city+"&S="+state+"&Z="+zip;
}
} else {
var str="?SRC=&#38;STYPE=S&#38;PG=L&#38;R=N&#38;C=&#38;N=&#38;T=&#38;S="
}
return str;
}

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});

resizeSearch();
